Name: Hani Ar Rifai
BioText:
Sheikh Hani bin Abdul Rahim bin Yahya al-Rifai, the Qari and the Imam and Khatib, born in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia in the year 1394 AH (1974 AD), is married and has five children (two sons and three daughters). He is currently the imam and preacher of a mosque Anani red district of Jeddah.

Sheikh Hani Rifai grew up in a religious family cares about its members to save the Qur'an, including his parents and his brothers mercy of God adult who serves as a role model, a Mahvzh to memorize the Book of God and the old is currently only 12 years old.
